meanings.definition: Consisting of or containing small, rounded grains (pisoliths)
meanings.sent1: The pisolitic texture of the rock made it feel rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The pisolitic soil in the garden was perfect for growing vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The pisolitic pattern on the wall looked like a bunch of tiny marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her pisolitic necklace sparkled in the sunlight like a field of tiny gems.
meanings.sent5: The pisolitic appearance of the sand reminded him of a beach covered in pebbles.
